member.name: CTL_USAGE
member.summary: The CTL_USAGE structure contains an array of object identifiers (OIDs) for Certificate Trust List (CTL) extensions. CTL_USAGE structures are used in functions that search for CTLs for specific uses.

member.name: CTL_USAGE.cUsageIdentifier
member.summary: Number of elements in the rgpszUsageIdentifier member array.

member.name: CTL_USAGE.rgpszUsageIdentifier
member.summary: Array of object identifiers (OIDs) of CTL extensions.
